team_0040_nelke_02:
Like I said before, the name’s Clive. Please don’t
forget it.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_03:
Yup, that’s me! Clive, the normal academy
student.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_05:
Thanks to you, I’ve been accepted into
Operation Starfall.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_06:
I need answers, that’s all.\c
How do I resolve this situation with Team Star...
and what’s causing its members’ odd behavior?[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_07:
Team Star is the subject of more than a few nasty
rumors swirling around the academy, you know.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_08:
Some say their bullying has caused a worrying
number of students to drop out of school...\c
Others say they’re holed up in their bases,
plotting to cause trouble for the academy.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_09:
But these are rumors. The matter I am directly
confronted with is something else...[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_10:
I’m talking about Team Star’s persistent truancy.
They’ve all been skipping class for a while now...[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_11:
Five of them in particular—the so-called “bosses”
of Team Star—haven’t so much as set foot inside\r
a classroom for over a year.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_12:
And it seems the team’s rank and file have
recently started stirring up mischief as well.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_13:
That’s why I took it upon myself to issue a direct
order to Team Star to disband.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_14:
I informed them that should they refuse, I would
have no choice but to expel all students affiliated\r
with their team...[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_15:
But I’m afraid there’s been no response. And the
deadline I set for them to make their choice\r
between dissolution or expulsion is nigh upon us.[npcn:1E]
team_0040_nelke_16:
So you see, when I overheard you talking on the
phone to Cassiopeia, it couldn’t have come at\r
a more crucial time...[npcn:1E]
team_0040_cassiopeia_01: It’s Cassiopeia. Can you hear me?[npcn:9]
team_0040_nelke_18:
*whisper whisper*
Another time, then...\c
*whisper whisper*
Be careful...[npcn:1E]
team_0040_cassiopeia_02:
I see you’re coming up to one of Team Star’s
bases. Was there...someone with you just now?[npcn:9]
team_0040_cassiopeia_03:
Well...be warned that Team Star will have its
guard up after losing one boss to you already.[npcn:9]
team_0040_cassiopeia_04: This base won’t go down as easily as the last one.[npcn:9]
team_0040_cassiopeia_05: Proceed with extreme caution. I’ll be in touch.[npcn:9]
